title: Microsoft Toolkit 2.6.2-Stable
description:
Microsoft ToolkitÂ®  - Official KMS Solution for Microsoft Products
This is a set of tools and functions for managing licensing, deploying, and activating Microsoft Office and Windows. All output from these functions is displayed in the Information Console. All functions are run in the background and the GUI is disabled to prevent running multiple functions, as they could conflict or cause damage if run concurrently. The Microsoft Office Setup Customization Functions (Customize Setup Tab), AutoKMS Uninstaller (if AutoKMS is installed), AutoRearm Uninstaller (if AutoRearm is installed), Office Uninstaller and Product Key Checker work even if Microsoft Office or Windows is not installed/supported. For information about individual functions, see the program readme.

â— What's New:

â—ˆ - Added Windows Server 2016 Azure Core KMS Key.
â—ˆ - Fixed invalid KMS PID Generation on Windows 10/Server 2016.
â—ˆ - Updated WinDivert Driver.
â—ˆ - Added Windows Build Number to the Main Windows Tab.
â—ˆ - EZ-Activator installs the KMS Key for the Windows SKU you initially installed on Windows 10 Anniversary Update.
â—ˆ - EZ-Activator skips Windows if already permanently activated.
â—ˆ - Support for checking Microsoft Office 2016 Online Server keys.
â—ˆ - Support for Windows 10 Anniversary Update.
â—ˆ - Support for Windows 10 LTSB 2016.
â—ˆ - Support for Windows Server 2016.
â—ˆ - Updated 3rd Party Libraries.
â—ˆ - Updated TAP Drivers

â— The system requirements:

â€¢ Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 or 4.5 (Not 3.5)
â€¢ Microsoft Office 2010 or Later for Office Toolkit Support
â€¢ Windows Vista or Later for Windows Toolkit Support
